name: Marzook Mansoor
bio: AI Engineer and Business Analyst passionate about applying AI to solve real business problems. I blend technical expertise with consulting experience to deliver practical, human-centered solutions.
tagline: Transforming businesses through AI innovation and data-driven insights

experience.impact: Supported digital transformation using Pega to automate cross-functional workflows; mapped AS-IS/TO-BE processes and aligned designs with consulting best practices; partnered with Agile squads to clarify requirements and improve sprint outcomes.

Analyzed consumer feedback with Python + AI sentiment to surface themes that informed messaging and product insights; combined qualitative coding with trend quantification; delivered data storytelling readouts and experiment proposals.

Built predictive analytics and reporting pipelines (Python, SQL) to support decisions; automated cloud-based workflows reducing reporting latency ~21% and improved a batch job from 52 → 41 minutes; delivered Power BI/Tableau dashboards for leadership visibility; collaborated cross-functionally to prioritize enterprise improvements.

experience.role: Graduate Assistant – Business Analysis & Database Admin, done
experience.impact: Taught SQL, statistics, and dashboarding; designed hands-on labs emphasizing automation and analytics workflows; maintained and optimized SQL Server/PostgreSQL databases to improve query performance and reporting accuracy.

projects.title: ChibiTomo
projects.description: AI-powered desktop Pomodoro companion with a friendly chibi avatar, always-on-top window, click-through lock mode, tray controls, and customizable sessions.
highlights: Contextual AI flavor with minimal, cute UI to improve focus
Drag & drop a photo to generate a chibi avatar
Packaged as a standalone Windows executable (PyInstaller)

projects.title: Aesculapius AI
projects.description: Privacy-first local LLM desktop assistant for household repair diagnostics with RAG, parts lookup, and local technician discovery.
highlights: Offline inference with contextual memory for step-by-step troubleshooting
Parts identification and retailer integration; local business finder
Packaged via PyInstaller with installer script

projects.title: LinkedIn Sentiment Assistant
projects.description: Chrome extension for responsible, AI-assisted LinkedIn engagement with sentiment analysis, rate limiting, toxicity filters, and learning selectors.
highlights: Auto-like with safety guardrails and DOM-adaptive selectors
Comment draft generation and engagement history
Local-only data with export/import of learned selectors

fun_facts: Born in India, moved to Oklahoma at age 8—proud of my Indian heritage and Oklahoma roots.
Love cats and cars; favorite foods are Mexican and Thai.
Built a 3D-printed medical device that helped my cat’s injured tail heal.
Passionate about fitness, volunteering, and giving back to my community.
Lifelong learner who values family and wants to honor my parents’ sacrifices.

education.degree: M.S. Management Information Technology (May 2025); B.B.A. Management Information Systems (May 2025) already graduated
education.school: University of Oklahoma — Price College of Business

goals.short_term: AI Engineer / Associate Consultant—apply AI and analytics to solve measurable business problems.
goals.long_term: Lead teams or build a company that helps people transition to better technology while giving back to honor my parents’ sacrifices.
